pr_title: Block Disruptor until flush is performed

timeline.message: Block disruptor until flush is performed

timeline.author: thisthat

replies.bodyText: It depends where do you want to have the shutdown logic implemented. If we just enqueue a shutdown type event then this is correct, if we do call explicitly shutdown from the thread that does queuing then this is not needed.

replies.bodyText:
Since the SpanProcessor is only visible in the DisruptorEventHandler class, we need to:

Set shutdown variable
Enqueue a Shutdown event
Wait for Shutdown event to be processed
